c74object.name: vtrunc~
c74object.description:
vtrunc~ provides a CPU efficient version of trunc~ using SIMD operations.
vtrunc~ converts signals with values such as 1.75 to 1.0. Negative values are modified so that -1.75 becomes -1.0. This object is very simple but computationally expensive.

method.name: signal
method.description: A signal whose values will be truncated. The trunc~ object converts signals with fractional values to the nearest lower integer value (e.g., a value of 1.75 is truncated to 1.0, and -1.75 is truncated to -1.0). This object is simple but computationally expensive.
